author: Erik C. Anderson | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Marcus Mariota, Tennessee Titans vs. Atlanta Falcons: Live updates, score and game chat
text:
Marcus Mariota , the former Oregon Ducks quarterback and Heisman Trophy-winner and his Tennessee Titans teammates get set for a Week 7 showdown against Matt Ryan, Julio Jones and the Atlanta Falcons .
More : TV channel and how to watch this game online
Follow along in the comments section, and add your own thoughts on the game by signing in below as we bring you analysis of Mariota's performance and live updates from the field as they happen.
